title: (15300) Betanzos - 2 Rúa Pintor Seijo Rubio
description: Automatic laundry, with several washers and dryers of various capacities. Three washers and four dryers. Payment in cash or card.

title: (15319) Betanzos - Rúa Alcalde Ramón Sánchez
description: Parking near the sports center of Betanzos. not extraordinary but close to the center and possibility of sleeping. supermarket next door and water point in front of the sports center to refuel

title: (15319) Betanzos - Avenida Juan García Naveira
description:
Parking near the Plaza de Betanzos, a highly recommended place to visit the city. Next to an Eroski (wc without needing to buy)
There is almost no shadow
Parking smooth, without slope
It's not pretty but it's convenient

In addition there are toilets under the metal door of the park "Pasatiempo".

title: (15319) Betanzos - 11 Rúa Arxentina
description: Large free parking on asphalt, convenient to visit the beautiful city of Betanzos. All services available.

title: (15319) A Coruña - 84 Aldea a Fraga
description: Gas station with LPG and laundry next door. Washing machine (8kg and 18kg) and tumble dryer (18kg)

title: (15389) Oza dos Ríos -
description: Rest area with picnik tables, no service

title: (15389) Oza de los Ríos - 23 Porzomillos
description: rest area on the way to A Coruña, perfect for a stopover, or to spend the night. very quiet place.

title: (15319) Betanzos - Autopista del Atlántico
description: Green areas and with shade.

title: (15165) Bergondo - 14 Pasaxe Pedrido
description:
Under a high bridge directly on the local beach.
Very quiet, although the bridge is busy.
We can't say how crowded it is here normally. It was windy today, so hardly anyone goes swimming. Also, no one had a party here on Saturday night.
Since there are parking spaces here in the entire curve, including under the high bridge, you have a good chance.
We only wanted to stay one night. Have slept well.

title: (15316) Coirós - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet esplanade next to the soccer field and the municipal swimming pool that only opens in summer. calm and quiet place to have a restful night. no services.

title: (15165) Bergondo - 12 Lugar Moruxo
description: Small parking very quiet, with benches nearby and without any traffic. It is empty since it has no commerce nearby.

title: (15630) A Ponte do Porco - 10 Rúa Alameda
title_short: (15630) A Ponte do Porco - 10 Rúa Alameda
description: Nice place by the river that flows into the sea. During the day there were a few cars here for picnics and dog walks, in the evenings and overnight we were alone. Very idyllic, but two noisy streets in the area. Accommodation for one night no problem. We felt very comfortable despite the noise from the street!

title: (15318) Abegondo - 25 Monte
description: Parking day and night with tables and playground for children. near supermarket, bakery and restaurant Casa Manolo.

title: (15318) Abegondo - 12 Lugar Seixurra
description: Nice parking next to the swamp

title: (15630) A Ponte do Porco - 1 Rúa Alameda
title_short: (15630) A Ponte do Porco - 1 Rúa Alameda
description: Small dirt parking lot in front of the beach, flat, with rubbish bins and showers (closed in winter). Quiet to spend the night (we stayed overnight in January, in the summer season it is not ideal)

title: (15166) Lubre - 15 Lugar Rua Lama
description: "field of the fair of all life" conditioned as a picnic area parking. Fixed barbecues, urban gym, playground, and indoor soccer / basketball court. Sada 9 minutes ...

title: (15319) Paderne - 132 Lugar Insua
description: Possibility of being able to rest and enjoy nature

title: (15167) Gandarío - 61 Lugar Gandario
description: Parking, open space. The police pass but do not say anything, they usually see autocaravans.

title: (15166) Sada - 16 N-VI
description: Rest area with a couple of benches and a fountain, with access from the Coruña-Betanzos national road, a little after the ITV warehouse. It is a parking lot with a green area behind some warehouses, you can hardly hear the traffic noise despite being so close. Valid for a quiet lunch stop without people around, to be able to eat outside and take a nap under the shade of a tree. As an area of passage it is fine and it is probably a good area to spend the night, because of how quiet and collected it is. No services

title: (15318) Abegondo - 6 DP-0105
description: English Way car park

name: Camping Aguiar

description: Camping Aguiar

title: (15659) Cambre - AC-221
description: Small car park for 2-3 vehicles, overlooking the dam and with nearby paths for excursions. No services. Bakery 200 meters. The train track passes very close but at night hardly any trains pass

name: Camping Green Village
title: (15167) Camping Green Village
description: Camping green village. camping on the beach.

title: (15166) Cambre - 49 Rua Espiritu Santo
description: Good parking area. Flat and with very good shade, perfect to rest in summer. We haven't slept but nothing seems to stop it except the Anaconda nightclub. Surrounded by a small industrial estate, which is closing soon, and next to the highway.

title: (15630) Miño - 15 AC-160
description: Place to spend the night. Well lit. Without services. Wide parking. Good central area of Miño. Supermarket very close as well as cafeteria and churreria for a good breakfast. Beach less than 2 km.

title: (15630) Miño - 26 Rúa Cobo
description: Laundry open all year.

title: (15630) Miño - 19 Rúa Telle
description: A quiet, shady place in the morning, under a highway bridge, next to a park with tables and stone seats.

title: (15160) Sada - 36 Rúa Praia
description:
Picnic area next to the beach.
Many tables to eat and spend the day
Bathrooms next door and a few meters away a park for children and a little further away a larger one in the center of the promenade

title: (15318) Abegondo - 54a San Marcos
description: Very large GSM service station with the possibility of changing Campingaz gas cylinders

title: (15160) Sada - 48 Rúa Linares Rivas
description: Laundry

title: (15630) Miño - 12 Rúa Estremeiro
description:
Great river beach, plenty of parking with a small area to pay from 930 am to 930 pm.
Windy (just today?). great for a convenient beach day. Restaurants and shops nearby

title: (15388) Oza dos Ríos - 54 Lugar Agra
description: Picnic area next to a river very well arranged with tables, games area and barbecues. 1 or 2 seats. With a good van, we have passed a bridge too narrow for AC.

title: (15160) Sada - 2 Avenida do Porto
description: A parking space to discharge sewage and refill drinking water, you can spend the night without problems and about 300 meters there is a dirt esplanade as a parking area next to a Carrefour

title: (15160) Sada - 10C Avenida do Porto
description: With a good view. Few places. Behind a supermarket and next to the sea.

title: (15160) Sada - 4 Avenida Sada y Sus Contornos
title_short: (15160) Sada - 4 Avenida Sada y Sus Contornos
description: Dirty parking but very useful when the area is full or occupied by cars. there is the supermarket right next door. very quiet night

title: (15639) Miño - 14 Avenida de Xarío
description: Ample parking on asphalt, slightly downhill, very quiet at night.

name: Camping Perbes
title: (15608) Camping Perbes
description: Camping Perbes rustic and family camping.

title: (15171) Oleiros - 13 Rúa o Barbanza
description: Parking in front of the Oleiros Emergency Base. It is less traveled and with much less noise than the AC-enabled area in Oleiros. Shopping centers very close to restock supplies. Very quiet to spend the night and continue the route.

title: (15639) Miño - AP-9
description: Parking space and water change. Helpful staff with picnic area and stores. They have a hose to fill and a screen for black and gray water. Numerous parking spaces with the possibility of staying overnight.

name: Rocamar campsite
title: (15608) Rocamar campsite
description: Rocamar campsite.

title: (15169) - 2B Arnela
description: Clean, quiet and pleasant free parking with sea views, benches and tables to park comfortably. The beach is basically 1 minute from the parking space just below. It can be reached by stairs in good condition. There is no height limit for the car.

title: (15660) Cambre - 7C Rúa Samosteiro
description: Free supply and disposal station, garbage cans.

title: (15660) Cambre - 7 Rúa Samosteiro
description: Parking space across the street. About 50 meters from the point of loading, unloading gray, black and filling. Next to the cemetery and the health center.

title: (15607) A Herbosa - 1 Carretera Perbes Arbosa
description: Good parking to go to the beach, The price is 2.5 euros. Place with tables to eat next to the cliff.

title: (15390) Cesuras - 13 DP-2601
description: Parking lot at the abandoned "Sanatorio De Cesuras" (Lost Place; entry prohibited); level parking on grass pavers; calm; hardly any traffic; Eucalyptus trees; Chirping of birds

title: (15607) Pontedeume - 132 A Ínsua
description: Nice little quiet corner, van access only.

title: (15181) Cambre - Autovía del Noroeste
description: Quiet asphalt site to sleep at night, next to the motorway entrance

title: (15679) O Temple - 15M Rúa Temple
description: Esplanade of land enabled as parking, good place to park and move around the area. It is very uneven.

title: (15607) Boebre - Boebre
description: Place in a beautiful pine forest, directly above the sea.

title: (15181) A Pena - 2A Lugar Sobrecarreira
description:
Nice place near cemetery and church. It is on the way for pilgrims to Santiago de Compostela.
Important:
The driveway is very narrow.  It can be a problem if a car goes opposite.

name: Camping Los Manzanos
title: (15179) Camping Los Manzanos
description: Oleiros, 65 Avenida Emilia Pardo Bazán. Super camping "los monzanos" 800 meters from the city center and the beach. shady calm and very clean.

title: (15670) Culleredo - Paseo da Ria do Burgo
title_short: (15670) Culleredo - Paseo da Ria do Burgo
description: Close to the airport, but at night there are no flights. Bike path at the beach of Santa Cristina. Gardens, sports fields ... crossing the restaurants of the bridge.

title: (15179) Espiño - 18 Rúa Casares Quiroga
description: Cemetery parking, large with large spaces for motorhomes or buses. Several Camper in the place the day of the visit. It has an area of garbage containers, and 100m a rest area with large tables to eat, with a garden to be with children. An old fountain next to it to catch water although it may not be drinkable. It does not have emptying areas, but it is about 3km from the free area of Sta Cruz to be able to empty and fill liquids.

name: Camping Ber
title: (15607) Camping Ber
description: Camping Ber. The proximity of Ber Beach is the reason for its name, this campsite is characterized by its tranquility and the surrounding environment. The area in which it is located offers many options for the enjoyment of free time; its landscapes, its natural monuments, its historical monuments and also the beaches which surround us, are the ideal entertainment for the leisure moments of the summer season.

name: Camping Ber Door
title: (15607) Camping Ber Door
description: Camping Ber Door, friendly and welcoming campsite, beautiful plot delimited by hedges with water and electricity, sea view and beach 300 m away

title: (15169) Sada - 41 Aldea San Pedro
description: Off-season parking, in dirt and grass, right next to the Praia de San Pedro. The parking lot is on a slope, there are only 2/3 more or less straight spaces accessible when empty. Easy access (campsite next door). No prohibition. Public toilets 100m just before the beach.

title: (15181) Cambre - 136 Altamira Arriba
description: Car park of the El Corte Inglés outlet store, open from Monday to Saturday from 10am to 9pm. Avoid going on Sundays, because they won't open until Monday.

title: (15179) Oleiros - 6 Praza Arsenio Iglesias
description: Water fountain in front of the sports hall.

title: (15607) Pontedeume - 14 Ber
description: Parking 25 meters from the beach.

name: Camping San Pedro - Sada
title: (15169) Camping San Pedro - Sada
description: Small campsite close to the beach, small in size, but in the absence of a nature spot, we had a good time there for not too much money compared to others in the area. Very hot showers, and many water points for washing up etc... Small restaurant nearby to save you from cooking, it's a change from Root's mode! The sector being relatively occupied by houses, it is a good solution while finding another more natural spot. Very friendly welcome from the owner…

title: (15616) Vilarmaior - 9 Lugar Eirexa
description: Large fairly flat gravelled area, water point, very quiet green area

title: (15175) Carral - 6 Praza Campo da Feira
description: Public parking, very quiet, in the town hall square of Carral. sleeping is not prohibited. In its surroundings there is a large playground, supermarkets, bakeries, bars and restaurants with affordable prices.

title: (15175) Carral - 23 Rua Paraiso
description: Gas station to empty the black and gray waters, very nice

title: (15318) Beche - 6 Lugar Beche
description: Motorhome area with toilets, waste water and place to empty toilet. The spout on the tap connector is large and flat with a spray and even our largest hose connector didn't fit as the pressure just made it spray out the top instead. after getting soaked 3 times we gave up and went to find another tap. If you have a long enough hose you may be able to use the sink tap in the men's toilet but we didn't.

title: (15175) Carral - 6-8 Travesía Alto do Castro
description: Free parking with all services around

title: (15172) Oleiros - 5 Rúa Zeus
description: Parking in the area of Perillo, gas station, macdonald's, there is a restaurant area nearby, quiet during the night, to spend a perfect night

title: (15179) Oleiros - 3 Rúa Marcial del Adalid
description: Close to a very busy road, on the edge of the street, 5 parking spaces available. Beach, bar and surf spot 5 mins walk. Taps with thread and pressure without thread drinking water, gray water disposal with container only.

title: (15600) Pontedeume - 8 CP-6901
description: Small parking lot of the San Miguel de Breamo hermitage. It is located at the end of the road, surrounded by nature and quite flat. We have spent the night here with no problem. They fit a couple of camper. In the morning, neighbors come for a walk.

title: (15179) Oleiros - 126C Avenida Ernesto Che Guevara
description: Water dispenser on paid parking lot at a nearby beach. A short stop to fill is of course free of charge. The fountain is right in front of the skate park, the pressure is good.

title: (15179) Oleiros - 798 Rúa Fieitos
description: Beautiful viewpoint overlooking the bay of Serantes and A Coruña. It is a field located in front of the Camping, with a blue zone from 12 pm to 8 pm and from June 1 to September 15. We did the night here without problem. Ideal for a coffee at sunrise with views and a relaxing walk through the park of the 13 roses. It has some containers for the waste.

name: Camping Bastiagueiro
title: (15179) Camping Bastiagueiro
description: Small family-run camping, very handy owners, reasonable price to service. Camper service with clogged drain. Located 100 m from the beach. you can reach Corunna by bus in 20 minutes (frequency Mon-Fri every 20 mins Saturdays every hour) stop at 200m

title: (15189) Culleredo - 36 Rúa Curro
description: Cemetery parking. Good place to spend the night if you are on your way to A Coruña, 15 minutes alone. Very quiet because it is far from the town and hardly any cars pass. There is a nice park right next door. There is a container to dispose of the garbage.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 969 Rúa do Portelo
description: Port of Lorbé, a very special and spectacular place. It deserves a visit. You can park in the port to enjoy the views and to sleep, at the entrance there are several marked parking spaces. We have been there many times without problem. All night there are fishermen and the place is super quiet.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 12 Rúa Santiaguiño
description: Small parking for 2 or 3 camper vans / vans near a beach and a small park. It is quite green and far from homes. Perfect for one night. Bring your waste / toilet paper with you because there are no bins. Respect nature.

title: (15600) Pontedeume - 10 Avenida Ricardo Sánchez
description: It is a very quiet sandy parking lot. It is not quite level, but it sleeps perfectly. Cafe next door and in the middle of the city.

title: (15614) Pontedeume - 35 Avenida Ricardo Sánchez
description: Close to the hospital, park and estuary... quite level last with space for about 15 AC

title: (15600) Pontedeume - nº1 Avenida Coruña
description: Self-service laundry.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 23 Rúa Gándara
description: Outdoor parking on grass terrain. Small corner under fir trees. Mera Beach is 600 meters away. Quiet area. You have to come from 7-20pm to have room.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 68 Avenida María Pita
description: Free parking close to the beach and Lagoa park. There are no services of any kind but it is quite good, yes, there is unevenness and there is a small ramp to access.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 8 Rúa dos Vinculeiros
description: Small car park with spaces set back from the beach at 100m. Parking in front of the mouth of a river. No service but quiet.

title: (15318) Abegondo - 5 Lugar Fraga
description: A festival or marketplace in front of the cemetery, which is also used as a parking lot. Slightly sloping. Observe market times (currently not recognizable)

title: (15600) Pontedeume - 77 Avenida Ferrol
description: Arriving at the Pontedeume halt, we have the so-called Fonte da Estación. Place where from long ago it was going to collect water.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 2 Rúa Volandeira
description:
Panorama point with about 10 parking spots.
on the edge of a cliff with views to the city.
Stay clean, 
don't throw your waste on the ground 
or in to the ocean, 
Thank you!

title: (15317) Aranga - 42 Carretera Villar
description: Attached to the A-6 motorway, it is a gravel parking lot, the Tizón bar parking lot. Wide, dark, no prohibition sign.

title: (15172) Oleiros - 9 Rúa Inglés
description: Parking without traffic since it has no exit it is cloudy

title: (15172) Oleiros - 811 Rúa Mazota
description: At the edge of the beach but estuary coast so protected the windy days. paying from 12h to 20h blue zone. next to a park with children's games 2 to 10 years old and turtle pond. light of the reverberes. pleasant walking area but possible passage at night. water and toilet nearby

title: (15621) Cabañas - 2 Avenida Arenal
description: Ideal parking to visit Pontedeume (cross the bridge on foot are 6 minutes) or go to Cabañas beach (5 minutes). No problem for all sizes of motorhome. You must go around the roundabout to access the highway and access the car park located on the right. Comfortable and practical

title: (15621) Cabañas - 1 Avenida Arenal
description: Landscaped park with public toilets, water point and numerous games for children. Perfect for a meal break or relaxation with the children.

title: (15621) Cabañas - 29a Rúa Adeza
description: Parking of the Magdalena Beach (there is an area where dogs are allowed) When you reach the roundabout, take the second exit, the parking lot is right where there are some chestnut trees. Views of the sea but close to a train line. There are no services.

title: (15621) Cabanas - 4 Calle Dia Ocho
description: It is a small parking lot where you can stay to rent small and large vans, the motorhomes surely also enter some, it is right next to the rowing club, and it has an access with a pontoon to be able to go kayaking or paddle surfing, the quiet night, There is no sign prohibiting parking or parking.

title: (15172) Oleiros - 781 Avenida Américas
description:
Small cars only!

Parking on the beach of Santa Cristina, next to A Coruña. Restaurants, supermarkets and all kinds of services at a pace and a spectacular view of the beach and the estuary. There is a picnic area, showers and bathrooms. Very calm during the night. Blue zone

title: (15390) Cesuras - 11 Lugar Vilar
description: Land parking next to Fervenzas da Re Oxidoira. Small car park next to a group of fervenzas (cataratas, in Galician) 5 minutes from the town of Curtis. Located in a typical Galician mountain. Highly recommended and quiet

title: (15619) Monfero - 1 Lugar Convento
description: Parking of the information house of the natural park, and next to the monastery of Santa María de Monfero. In the information house they told us that we could spend the night, very quiet area.

title: (15175) Carral - Unnamed Road
description: The place is ideal to spend the night.

title: (15621) Cabañas - 53 Avenida Arenal
description: Drinking water fountain along the way

title: (15623) Ares - Rúa Nova
description: Small quiet car park, with access to a beautiful little beach. Please note that the access is too narrow for motorhomes, only cars and vans can access it. Few parking spaces, a few cars during the day but no one there at night.

title: (15619) Monfero - Carretera Vnu
description: Space right after a curve for more than 15 campers. Between trees. Space should be used to make wood by the locals. Quiet and peaceful

title: (15624) Ares - 9 Rúa Coronel José Gabeiras
description: Good area, quiet. Although it does not have any type of service. If you go further to the end of the street, in the Club Náutico area, it is a little quieter, as there is no car traffic.

name: Bar O Emigrante
title: (15627) Bar O Emigrante
description: Wide esplanade with access to a beautiful cove. There is a bar with a terrace. You can spend the night without problem. CLARIFICATION: the place is a private property, its owner is the owner of the Restaurant, it is recommended to request permission for the overnight stay and behave civically

title: (15189) Folguiera - 1 Rúa Alonso Pedreira
description: Repsol for black and gray water as well as washing and drinking water.

name: Camping O Raso A Coruña
title: (15623) Camping O Raso A Coruña
description: Camping by the sea. Very quiet and shady. Wonderful view of the Rio of Ares. Superb and great beach 10 meters. Young Manager friendly. Nice step.

title: (15183) Carral - 5 Lugar Teixoeiras
description: Area with picnic tables, below the road, so rather noisy. Hostel a little further and hiking trail departures.

title: (15177) Oleiros - 7 Rúa Celso Emilio Ferreiro
description: Cliff area between the Faro Grande and the Faro Faro. Very quiet place With panoramic views of La Coruña. There is a fountain and a wooden shed with two containers for waste (organic and non-organic).

title: (15006) La Coruña - 2 AC-10
description: It is a normal parking where you can find a place quite easily

title: (15623) Ares - 1 Aldea Redes
description: Parking without prohibition sign, difficult to park for large motorhome, quiet place

title: (15177) Oleiros - 28 Rúa da Costa
description:
Picnic place with 3 stone tables, below a source of drinking water.
sloped parking for 6 vehicles and 2 level parking spaces for adults. Very quiet, you can spend the night, but respecting and caring for the environment, it is a Biosphere Reserve.

title: (15009) La Coruña - 2 Rua Inés de Ben
title_short: (15009) La Coruña - 2 Rua Inés de Ben
description: Good place to spend the night! Very good view. Services has nothing. Nearby park for children.

title: (15623) Ares - 12 Avenida Redes
description:
It is a parking lot on a small beach with beautiful views. You have to be careful with the way you access it since Google Maps can get you through complicated roads. We travel with a 6m Camper. and to get the gps we got into some somewhat complicated roads, the next day to leave we were guided by Google maps but without gps and we had no problem.
So follow the main roads when going to the site, no shortcuts with bigger motorhomes! We had to turn around once due to small streets.

Make sure to take the walk starting at the parking lot through the forest to the next small city Redes. Very beautiful small authentic city.

title: (15623) Ares - 10 Calle Paralelo
description: In Redes there is a car park but it is usually full and has spaces for cars, they are not valid for caravans. On this street there are car parks painted in white so you can park. We have spent the night and without problem.

title: (15627) Fene - 19A Lugar Rio Castro
description: Ample and level parking. Easy access to beaches and next to a very nice and cheap pizzeria. Very quiet place.

title: (15623) Ares - 23 Avenida Mediterráneo
description: Parking in urbanization, next to a day center... At least on Sundays it is empty and you can leave the AC quietly. Closer to the town it is difficult to find such an accessible parking

title: (15623) Ares - 85 Aldea Seselle
description: Parking on the beach with views of all estuaries. I only recommend small motorhomes the places are small.

title: (15008) A Coruña - 187 Rua Lisboa
description: Parking in the area of the universities. Ideal for visiting the city. Bus stop number 24 two minutes walk. We have parked in non-school period and it was empty.

title: (15006) A Coruña - 1 Avenida Pasaxe
description: Nearby parking, clean and tidy. 3 washing machines and 3 dryers. In theory, you can't enter with a dog, but we entered with it and the owners didn't tell us anything. Bar next door for a beer if you have to wait

title: (15623) Ares - 107 Lugar Seselle
description: Large and level parking more or less, next to the beach, with beautiful views and with nearby houses, quiet, but shared with cars.

title: (15624) Ares - 34 Avenida Saavedra Meneses
description: Parking area next to the beach promenade, with trees. From September 1 you can park without problem, only blue zone in summer. Quiet, movement in the morning. near bars, restaurants, playground, promenade and beach.

title: (15183) Carral - 15 Lugar Travesas
description: Ermita de san roque. place of picnic with tables in the shade, game for the children, small chapel and a water point.

title: (15009) A Coruña - 3 Avenida de Lamadosa
description: Very quiet area, not very crowded, there are plenty of parking lots.

name: Área de autocaravanas fragas del Eume
title: (15617) Área de autocaravanas fragas del Eume
title_short: (15617) Área de autocaravanas fragas del Eume
description:
EUME FRAGAS PRIVATE AREA


Private motorhome area where you can enjoy the tranquility of the mountain.


- SERVICES: 12 places with electricity, 20 places without electricity, 10 showers, washing machine/dryer, water emptying and filling area, dining room with sink, microwave, fridge, tables. .. , vending machine for drinks and snacks where you can also change clothes, picnic areas with barbecue, children's play area, swimming pool...
Baker, meats for barbecue, charcoal, there is a supermarket 1.5 km away for small purchases (Ponte da Pedra cooperative)

We have marked hiking routes that start from the same area, 4x4 excursions through the Fragas del Eume and a children's playground, nature workshop, swimming pool...

title: (15198) Culleredo - O Petón
description: Mount Xalo. Nature 15 minutes from the city. Easy dirt access, not suitable for large motorhomes. Many flat parking lots. 2 large stone picnic tables. Spectacular views of the city with beautiful sunset. At night, there is no one left and there is no artificial light. It is an area frequented by walkers and climbers.

title: (15609) Pontedeume - DP-6902
description: Nice quiet place by the river. Picnic benches and barbecue available. Protected area at night prohibited

name: AresPark Autocaravanas
title: (15624) AresPark Autocaravanas
description: Area for motorhomes / camper / caravans. Located in the city center, it has all the services. At 5 minutes we have the Park and the Beach. Price: Includes electricity, discharge/charge of water, bathrooms and common areas. Possibility of space without electricity (ask for price). Prices may be subject to change: According to season, offers, long stay, etc.

name: Camping Fragadeume
title: (15617) Camping Fragadeume
description: Camping Fragadeume at the doors of the Natural Park "Fragas do Eume".

title: (9J97+MP) La Coruña - 4 Ánimas
description: Parking in the docks of A Coruna. The site is right next to the port authority building, the best location for sightseeing and offers space for 15 mobile homes. Parking is available on two sides. The sides are separated by the well-known bike path that circles the entire city. Many joggers, cyclists and pedestrians on the way, which is why there is always something going on and you can safely leave the car at home. Maximum length on the left side 7 meters, on the right side 4.50 meters. A Dixiklo is currently set up that can be used. Garbage cans are also available for organic and residual waste disposal. We stood two nights including day with two other mobile homes.

title: (15001) La Coruña - 2 Paseo Marítimo Alcalde Francisco Vázquez
title_short: (15001) La Coruña - 2 Paseo Marítimo Alcalde Francisco Vázquez
description: Good to park. We spent the night with a van. Quiet, illuminated, overlooking the port, fountain nearby, bathroom nearby, the center at a walk, in case you get a card you could shower in the Marina ...

title: (15317) Aranga - Unnamed Road
description: In the countryside not far from the small village of Aranga. Tables including a large covered and 2 barbecues in hard as well as bins. 2 hiking or biking nearby. Perfect for a quiet break away from the coast. Possibility of bathing.

title: (15310) Curtis - 8 Lugar Centeas
description: Space for 4 Motorhomes. Has individual water taps BUT no water. Very small spaces. Tight squeeze for >7m. On main road so could be noisy at night.

name: Parking Caravanas Marina Coruña
title: (15001) Parking Caravanas Marina Coruña
description: Nouvelle aire camping-car située dans une marina au-dessus d'un parking souterrain avec 25 emplacements 8m*4m, eau et vidanges, sanitaires à partager avec les marins ainsi que lave-linge et sèche-linge. Vue sur le port, nuit calme et réveil au cri des mouettes. Seulement une dizaine de campers pour cette fin août, il faut dire que le tarif est prohibitif.

title: (15001) Coruña ( A ) - 10 Paseo Marítimo Alcalde Francisco Vázquez
title_short: (15001) Coruña ( A ) - 10 Paseo Marítimo Alcalde Francisco Vázquez
description: Parking area both in battery and in parallel, with shade and views of the promenade, 5-10 minutes walk from Maria Pita, we stayed to sleep because we did not move the van and well, quiet less when cars passed at full speed that even the van moved us, but it was not something that would put us back if we had to choose a place again. Dawn just ahead, very pretty

title: (15617) Monfero - DP-6902
description: Small dirt parking a bit sloping 1.5 km after the interpretation center, which also has another small parking and to which access is easier.  From there, you reach by a narrow road next to the river Eume, if you are facing another vehicle one will have to go back to a crossing zone.  Located next to the first suspension bridge (ideal for going to the monastery), next to a small building (closed) and public toilets (open, Turkish type).  There is no service, only parking and bivouac.  If it rains, the trees drip onto the vehicle and it becomes uncomfortable.  Pretty isolated (we were alone).

title: (15609) Pontedeume - DP-6902
description: Parking attached to the river. It has picnic area and barbecue. They usually park motorhomes etc ...

title: () La Coruña - 6 Ánimas
description: Parking under the bridge 10 min walk from the center. Narrow squares but protected from the elements. BEWARE, the parking lot ahead is for residents (yellow line).

title: (15609) Pontedeume - DP-6902
description: Recreational area next to the Eume River in the Natural Park of Las Fragas del Eume. Here begin hiking and mountain biking routes there is water Potable

title: (15008) A Coruña - 5 Avenida Pablo Picasso
description: Self-service laundry with parking area very close. Very clean and with long hours, every day from 8 a.m. to 10:30 p.m.

title: (15001) La Coruña - Paseo Maritimo
description: Parking along the avenue, ideal for a visit to the city

title: (15619) Guitiriz -
description: Enjoy the ocean view, wind and fresh cow dung. Flat parking for 2 vans. Access by well maintained gravelroad.

title: (15689) Mesía - 16 Lugar Painceira
description: Parking football field and area of walk and swings

title: (15007) A Coruña - 113 Rúa Ronda de Outeiro
title_short: (15007) A Coruña - 113 Rúa Ronda de Outeiro
description: Laundromat is very clean and new. It can be washed and dried. Easy to use with coins, bills can be changed at a machine in the salon. Select a program and it will be washed - no detergent required. Short duration for the washing process approx. 40 minutes. There is WiFi and power outlets. We loved it. ?

title: (15190) A Coruña - 8 Mesoiro
description: There's gas here. Also for German bottles.

title: (15626) Franza - 16 Avenida Francisco Vizoso
description: Butane gas service belonging to the Monica Bar and tobacconist.

title: (15626) Mugardos - 2 Rúa San Victorio
description: Quiet parking in Franza, 50 meters from Bar Mónica where there is gas butane service and tobacconist, you can also visit the area where there are various bars and walking routes that can reach O Seixo (2.5km) or Ares at the same distance more or less.

title: (15004) A Coruña - 21 Avenida de Arteixo
description: Paid blue zone but close to the center

title: (15008) A Coruña - 35B Rúa Gambrinus
description:
Battery parking lot to visit part of the city. Next to the MEGA (Museum of Estrella Galicia) and 10 minutes walk from the House of Sciences. Next to a park where animals are accepted. During the day, very good. Length limitation because it is a classic car park.

public toilets from 10 a.m. to 9 p.m. in summer (different times outside summer)

title: (15008) A Coruña - 44X Rúa Isaac Peral
description: Cheap gas station and car wash for campers up to 3.3m.

title: (15004) A Coruña - 16 Rúa Magistrado Manuel Artime
title_short: (15004) A Coruña - 16 Rúa Magistrado Manuel Artime
description: Mimomint laundry, 9 a.m. to 10:30 p.m. weekdays, 10 a.m. to 10:30 p.m. weekends. Laundry and drying service, payment possible in cash only (notes and coins). 3 washing machines 11kg, 14kg , 19kg. 3 dryers 30min. Accessible toilets, remember to bring your paper!

title: (15002) A Coruña - 5 Rúa Regata Cutty Sark
title_short: (15002) A Coruña - 5 Rúa Regata Cutty Sark
description: Parking near the lighthouse, good alternative during the day when all the lighthouse car parks are close. Ideal for the day. I think we can also sleep

title: (15002) A Coruña - 8 Rua Fuente San Amaro
title_short: (15002) A Coruña - 8 Rua Fuente San Amaro
description: Free parking in a dirt field very close to the Hercules tower.

title: (15002) La Coruña - 39 Avenida Hércules
description: Laundry

title: (15685) Hospital - 12 Lugar Hospital
description: Parking a little inclined, but suitable and very quiet in the village of Bruma next to the pilgrims' hostel. Narrow road to get here from AC542. Very appropriate to follow the Camino de Santiago.

title: (15002) A Coruña - 9 Praza do Galatea
description: Parking in a residential area, 5 minutes from the Torre de Hércules Sculpture Park. A walk of several kilometers along the coast of A Coruña full of sculpture along the trails.

title: (15002) A Coruña - 8D Praza Adormideras
description: Parking of a residence with large places. Playground, beach 100m away and near the Hercules tower. Perfect when there is no room above.

title: (15500) Fene - v Astano Parcela B3
description: Gasoline service area can be washed the motorhome, with parking in the immediate vicinity and a supermarket nearby with parking. The gas station has a shop and restaurant

title: (15008) A Coruña - AC-552
description: You can exchange your blue butane bottles here!

title: (15008) A Coruña - 43 Carretera Baños de Arteixo
title_short: (15008) A Coruña - 43 Carretera Baños de Arteixo
description: Parking of the marineda city shopping center, there are ikea, leroy merlin, decathlon, … points to charge phones/batteries and wifi in the center, there are arcade games, karts and a freestyle park, ideal for spending the day, they have parking spaces for motorhomes and vans, free.

title: (15002) A Coruña - 131 Paseo Marítimo
description: Free parking at the Torre de Hercules It has a small quiet beach, ideal for children. You can ONLY use the places designated for ACs, if on arrival they are occupied by other vehicles, you must call 092 (Local Police).

title: (15528) Fene - Cabanas - N-651
description: gas station with shower

title: (15617) Monfero - Unnamed Road
description: Flat space in the middle of nature. I agreed with my T4, but I would only recommend it for 4x4.

title: (15008) A Coruña - 45 Rúa Severo Ochoa
description: SBC Service Station Cheap diesel. It has a washing without limit of height for our Cars.

name: Camping O Parral. Chanteiro
title: (15625) Camping O Parral. Chanteiro
description: Small and familiar camping. Minimum services. Outdated. Shading. Next to the beach. Terrace and restaurant overlooking the beach.

title: (15625) Ares - 178 Lugar Chanteiro
description: Large parking lot, with water, beach 50 meters away, very quiet place, we spent one night and passed the Civil Guard. No problem.

title: (15002) A Coruña - Unnamed Road
description: ATTENTION: Parking areas have been redistributed, now you can ONLY park in the first 6 spaces throughout the year. Outside these squares, the Local Police will fine you. RESPECT THE SIGNS.

title: (15011) A Coruña - 1 Rúa Sor Joaquina
description: Half an hour wash 3 euros. Dryer 1 euro for every 10 minutes

title: (15625) Ares - Unnamed Road
description: TOP site. Sunset for pure photography. Nothing more to say.

title: (15625) Chanteiro - Unnamed Road
description: Parking for the local climbing sectors. easy levelling, directly on the coast with a view on the industrial harbor opposite. no services. accesible by dirt road. only for vans.

title: (15011) A Coruña - 42A Grupo Maria Pita
description: Large wasteland behind house 100m from the cornice accessible only for van. Can help if all other car parks are complete. Very quiet night.

title: (15011) A Coruña - 4 Rúa Manuel Azaña
description: Laundry

title: (15011) Visma - 1 Rua Caldemoreiras
description: Level place with views of the city. We have only spent one night, no noise or problem. To me it seems better than the nearby free area which is very uneven.

title: (15011) A Coruña - 4B Estrada Os Fortes
description:
New parking lot in A Coruña with 1 platform for filling water and emptying gray and black.

The parking lot does not have parking marks, so it can be used by all sizes of vehicles.

Just 2 minutes walk from a shopping center and the Los Rosales neighborhood where you can find everything.

A 12-minute walk from the Riazor Beach.

20 minutes walk from the city center.

Camping is not allowed (awnings, tables, chairs, clotheslines and others)

LET'S TAKE CARE OF IT so that we are not prohibited from parking.

title: (15620) Mugardos - 66 AC-133
description: Lavalux Laundry

title: (15620) Mugardos - 15 Santa Lucía
description: Parking of the church of San Vicente de Mehá. Very very quiet place with beautiful views of the river. Without height limit or restrictions. 5 minutes walk from the city center. Recommended to visit Mugardos in summer.

title: (15010) A Coruña - 73 DP-3003
description: A nice parking lot directly at a really nice park for ao dogs. We stood here very quiet for one night (04/19). Parking is plentiful. From the park has my great view of the ocean. Shadow places available.

name: hotel fraga do eume
title: (15613) hotel fraga do eume
description: Private area, but without the possibility of emptying. Very quiet, located in the entrance portal to the Fragas do Eume natural park. Request authorization to enter the nearby Fragas do Eume hotel or the Casa Peizas restaurant Within a hundred meters you have the hotel and the Casa Peizas restaurant, with local cuisine and bar. Number of excursions in the natural park, with river and beautiful deciduous forests. Also near Forgoselo, a good place to catch mushrooms. Less than five minutes a well-equipped sports climbing school with a variety of grades, from IV to 7c and another classic climbing area in the canyon with easy tracks of several lengths. It is closed with a chain, so that they open you have to call the hotel reception

title: (15008) Arteixo - 119 Travesía de Meicende
description: Laundry with plenty of parking in a 6m battery, cafeteria and brewery next to it for waiting.

title: (15011) La Coruña - Avenida Fernando Suárez García
title_short: (15011) La Coruña - Avenida Fernando Suárez García
description: 11 free parking spaces reserved for motorhomes. They are approximately 8 meters long, painted obliquely to the sidewalk. Located next to the seafront promenade, Monte de San Pedro lift (paying), bike path and with a beautiful view of the urban beaches, Torre de Hércules... just 5 minutes walk away is the Barrio de los Rosales with supermarkets, pharmacy, bars, a bit of everything. Public toilet available from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (15625) Ares - 250 CP-0402
description: Small esplanada / parking next to the Battery of Salgueira. Lovely sunset walking towards the tip. We have spent a very quiet night. Place without any service.

title: (15011) A Coruña - 53 Rúa Emilio González López
title_short: (15011) A Coruña - 53 Rúa Emilio González López
description: Auga & Xabon. Very cheap.

title: (15620) Mugardos - 48 Avenida Mar
description: Car park

title: (15620) Mugardos - 50 Aldea a Redonda
description: Small parking on the ground. Very quiet place to spend the night and with excellent views. A few meters from La Palma castle and the lighthouse. If you continue forward there is a track of about 6 km where you can park perfectly. Incredible views

title: (15011) A Coruña - Av Fernando Suarez Garcia
title_short: (15011) A Coruña - Av Fernando Suarez Garcia
description: Public parking with WC in very good condition and care.

title: (15500) Fene - 31-15 Estrada da Palma
description: Parking of a supermarket 'Dia'. Quiet. No barrier.

title: (15011) - 2A Lugar Puerto de San Pedro
description: Public car park between the other two Park4Night sites. Significantly more sheltered from the wind than the seaside pitch and less inclined than the mobile home pitch.

title: (15011) - 2 Lugar Puerto de San Pedro
description: Spacious, quiet and isolated place with direct views of the sea, below a restaurant and a small fishing port. There are two places available for disposal, as well as a garbage disposal. Cabin with public toilets right in front and an outdoor shower in a small field right next to the port ramp.

title: (15500) Fene - 3 Rúa San Salvador
description: Laundry 8, 13 and 17kg / 3 dryers 17kg. Lots of places nearby, very clean, toilets, distributor, wifi and seats to wait (between 20 and 30min for the programs)

title: (15685) Mesía - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with several tables. Beautiful, well-maintained place with trees and a small stream where you can cool off your neck! We had a very pleasant cool break there

title: (15011) A Coruña - 10A Lugar Poblado del Portiño
title_short: (15011) A Coruña - 10A Lugar Poblado del Portiño
description: Parking of the small port 10 meters from the water. Ideal for sleeping

title: (15140) Pastoriza - Rúa Choupana
description: Ws a place to park one or two housing vans (the bad ones called Camper), or two motorhomes not very bulky. since it really is a shoulder, but the local police say nothing to park. yes ... no more than one or two. It is close to the Coruña, you can go by bike effortlessly. It is a quiet and safe place, which is the most important. There are buses. It has a spring water fountain, sewers. trash bins. etc. I mean ... ideal for the night. or more than one day. Highly recommended if you want to sleep peacefully, cook inside, and have very good security. There is also a Covrán supermarket very close, and a store before the super with very better prices than the super and good bread, there are bars. and the crossing bar is highly recommended. go from Luis the one of the POS. They always treat well. But even better. Ideal for eating typical dishes, why they combine that you don't even believe it. tripe, tortilla, churrasco, Galician stew (exquisite if you go first thing, since Cocu d is to eat it now and better than waiting).

title: (15011) A Coruña - 12 Poboado O Portiño
description: Parking with beautiful view close to la Coruña. Public toilettes open from 9am to 9pm.

title: (15011) A Coruña - 10 Lugar Puerto de San Pedro
title_short: (15011) A Coruña - 10 Lugar Puerto de San Pedro
description: Nice little spot on the water, above a cliff. Perfect for watching the sunset and then spending the night there. We were calm. A fisherman came by in the morning. Space is accessible for RVs and enough for 2-3 campers. Nearby is a restaurant with a sun terrace (La Tita Rivera) which is also great for the sunset. Furthermore, a few hundred meters away is a service point for campers with fresh water and waste water disposal (see GMaps).

title: (15500) Fene - 1 Avenida Mar
description: Ample and little crowded parking. To make a stop or rest. Supermarket at 100 meters, promenade and recreation area. Illuminated and quiet at night. In the immediate vicinity there are sources of drinking water. Sports Center. Coffee shops.

title: (15401) Ferrol - Rúa Castro
description: Parking in a dead end on the edge of the port. A bit of passage in the evening, but we slept quietly. lots of free space at 8am.

title: (15010) A Coruña -
description: Place to picnic or even spend the night

title: (15403) Ferrol - 31 Avenida de Mac Mahón
description: Esplana of a business closing next to a military base. Ideal for visiting the military museum.

title: (15500) Fene - 40 Avenida Mar
description: Perfect for night, or spend the day. Supermarket next door, wc and shower on the beach.

title: (15401) Ferrol - 65 Rúa Espartero
description:
Nice laundrette with WiFi and coffee machine.

Wheelchair accessible.

title: (15401) Ferrol - Estrada Porto Graña
description: Parking in battery stuck to a street and the port does not pass people the only noise is the cars that pass but it is the closest thing I found in the town

title: (15141) Arteixo - 1 Rúa Calderón de la Barca
title_short: (15141) Arteixo - 1 Rúa Calderón de la Barca
description: Place with good views, near La Coruña, buses etc. Perfect for three or 4 motor homes, both day and night. Quiet place

title: (15590) Ferrol - 36 Rúa Real Baixa
description: Drinking water fountain with tap

title: (15593) Ferrol - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the Cape Prioriño, magnificent views over the Ferrol ares coruña river, quiet place to spend the night, there is a lot of wind.

title: (15403) Ferrol - 17 Rúa Naturista López Seoane
description: Small laundry. Good and free parking nearby also for high vehicles. WiFi in the salon.

title: (15591) Brión -
description: Site accessible by the Aldea Brión, from which starts (43.4784391, -8.2756914) a fairly easy dirt forest path (access in dry weather with a CC of 7m). The spot is perfectly flat, could accommodate a good number of trucks, we didn't see anyone there between 8 p.m. and noon the next day. A few steps from the plateau, incredible panoramic views of Ferrol, La Coruña in the distance. Departures for walks in lush vegetation + several mountain bike trails are directly within reach. The site adjoins an apparently disused military area.
